sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-form', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './contact-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-form.component.css'] }) export class ContactFormComponent { formData = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; submitted = false; onSubmit() { if (this.formData.name && this.formData.email && this.formData.message) { console.log('Form Data:', this.formData); // Here you can later integrate email service (like EmailJS or backend API) this.submitted = true; this.formData = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; } } }
